props.name: cc
props.docblock: specifies the email's carbon copy recipients

description.text: specifies the email's carbon copy recipients

props.name: bcc
props.docblock: specifies the email's blind carbon copy recipients

description.text: specifies the email's blind carbon copy recipients

props.name: target
props.docblock: specifies where the link should open. The default behavior is `_self`, which means that the URL will be loaded into the same browsing context as the current one

description.text: specifies where the link should open. The default behavior is `_self`, which means that the URL will be loaded into the same browsing context as the current one

props.name: onClick
props.docblock: specifies the callback function when the link is clicked

description.text: specifies the callback function when the link is clicked

props.name: externalLink
props.docblock: The object that contains the `alternativeText` and `title` fields which specify the text and title for links with a `_blank` target (which loads the URL in a new browsing context).

description.text: The object that contains the `alternativeText` and `title` fields which specify the text and title for links with a `_blank` target (which loads the URL in a new browsing context).
